thread.section_title: Gym Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gym Direct | www.gymdirect.com.au
thread.title: Thomas Foley
thread.title_full: Gym Direct reviewed by Thomas Foley

author: Thomas Foley
title: Thomas Foley
text: I bought an Olympic barbell, 100kg of bumpers and 107.5kg of powerlifting plates from Gym Direct about 2 weeks ago and have used them almost daily since then. I'm very happy with the quality of all the products so far, as they all look built too last. I live on a rural property and was surprised by how quickly my order arrived. Before purchasing, I did a lot of research and this company's prices were very competitive and their customer service was excellent, as I was on the phone to them with questions several times. Keep up the great work Gym Direct!
